Class MoveNormal

java.lang.Object
  battlesys.Move
      battlesys.MoveNormal
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbsorbAtk, AimedAtk, AllAbsorbAtk, AntiHpAtk, ArmourThrough, BasicAtk, ChargeAtk_Real, ConsecutiveAtk, ExtraCritAtk, FocusAtk, GroupAtk, ImprovedAtk, MomentumAtk, MoveChangeAbilityAttack, MoveStatus, NatureAtk, NatureAtk3, PercentCutAtk, RandomAtk, SelfDestruct, StrongAtk, SurroundAtk, SurroundAtk2
public abstract class MoveNormal
extends Move

Class for normal move - moves that do direct attacks Damage way can be modified through changing the parameters

          whether the damage is fixed, regardless of user's or target's attack or defense
protected  double hpEffect
          effect on user hp, negative means the less user hp, the higher the power, and vice versa. 0 means no effect due to user hp

          affect due to speed difference
